snippet.title: Curse of Eternity Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
A hardcore Action RPG with diverse combat and intricate class customization. Start as one of three hero builds and either continue to specialize, or branch out and make your build your own. Slice, shoot, and zap your way through a dystopian world of dead gods and fulfill your own deific journey.

Wishlist CoE on Steam! https://steam.curseofeternity.com/
Join our newsletter! https://newsletter.imakedagames.com/
Check out our website! http://curseofeternity.com/
https://twitter.com/imakedagames/
